com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue.keyvalue

Interface OrderedKeyValueStoreManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KeyValueStoreManager, StoreManager

    public interface OrderedKeyValueStoreManager
extends KeyValueStoreManager
    A KeyValueStoreManager where the stores maintain keys in their natural order.
    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (me@matthiasb.com);

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mutateMany(Map<String,KVMutation> mutations, StoreTransaction txh)
      Executes multiple mutations at once.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.keycolumnvalue.StoreManager

        beginTransaction, clearStorage, close, getFeatures, getName

    • Method Detail

      • openDatabase

        OrderedKeyValueStore openDatabase(String name)
                                  throws StorageException
        Opens an ordered database by the given name. If the database does not exist, it is created. If it has already been opened, the existing handle is returned.

        Specified by:
        openDatabase in interface KeyValueStoreManager
        Parameters:
        name - Name of database
        Returns:
        Database Handle
        Throws:
        StorageException

      • mutateMany

        void mutateMany(Map<String,KVMutation> mutations,
              StoreTransaction txh)
                throws StorageException
        Executes multiple mutations at once. Each store (identified by a string name) in the mutations map is associated with a KVMutation that contains all the mutations for that particular store. This is an optional operation. Check StoreManager.getFeatures() if it is supported by a particular implementation.
        Parameters:
        mutations -
        txh -
        Throws:
        StorageException
